init(bytes).details: This function is called by the deployer/factory when creating a contractA blank init function is required to be able to call genesisDeriveFutureAddress to get the deterministic addressSince no data is required to be intialized the selector is just returned and _setInitialized() does not need to be called

params.target: target for contract to update metadata for

EditionInitialized(address,string,string.notice: Event for a new edition initialized

init(bytes).notice: Used internally to initialize the contract instead of through a constructor

initializeWithData(bytes).notice: Default initializer for edition data from a specific contract
